==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|天|地|点}}

===Pronunciation===

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|てんちてん}}

# in [[漢文|''kambun'']], a quanternary type of [[返り点|''kaeriten'']] following [[一二点|ichiniten]], [[甲乙点|''kōotsuiten'']], and [[上下点|jōgeten]] in which the reading order is marked with 天, 地, and 人 indicating the order
